comment.text: Signs in a social media authentication process, typically appearing on buttons or dialogs to confirm selection of Facebook as an account provider.

usage.context:
? t("Common:SignUpWithGoogle")
 : t("Common:SignInWithGoogle");
 case "facebook":
 return signUp
 ? t("Common:SignUpWithFacebook")
 : t("Common:SignInWithFacebook");
 case "twitter":
 return signUp
 ? t("Common:SignUpWithTwitter")
 : t("Common:SignInWithTwitter");
 case "linkedin":

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation "تسجيل الدخول Facebook" is a literal transliteration of "Sign in with Facebook" instead of a proper translation. It doesn't convey the intended meaning naturally in Arabic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تسجيل الدخول باستخدام فيسبوك (Tasjeel al-dukhool bi-istikhdaam Facebook)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic text lacks proper spacing and potentially punctuation to appear more natural in a UI context. While technically correct, it's not ideal for presentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تسجيل الدخول باستخدام فيسبوك (Tasjeel al-dukhool bi-istikhdaam Facebook)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'Login' is a more literal translation of 'Sign in'. A more idiomatic German equivalent would be 'Anmelden'

While technically correct, "Մուտք գործել Facebook-ով" is a very literal translation. A more natural and idiomatic Armenian phrase would be preferable. 'Մուտքագրվել Facebook-ի միջոցով' or 'Մուտքագրվել Facebook-ով' (using a shortened form) would sound more fluent.

The translation "Entrar com Facebook" is a literal translation but doesn't convey the same level of formality or user experience as "Sign in with Facebook". A more natural and commonly used translation would be "Acessar com Facebook" or "Fazer login com Facebook".

While 'Conectare cu Facebook' is understandable, a more accurate and common translation for 'Sign in with Facebook' would be 'Autentificare cu Facebook' or 'Logare cu Facebook'. 'Conectare' implies a general connection, whereas 'Autentificare' or 'Logare' specifically refer to the authentication/login process.

The translation 'Пријави се путем Facebook-а' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Serbian. A more idiomatic translation would be 'У loguj се са Facebook-ом' or 'Пријави се са Facebook-ом'.

While 'Identifikohuni me Facebook' is understandable, a more natural and commonly used translation would be 'Kyquni me Facebook' or 'Hyni me Facebook'. 'Identifikohuni' is more formal and less frequently used in this context.
